title.narrative: Lesotho HIV and AIDS Technical Assistance Project

description.narrative: The project aims at building capacity of government agencies and civil society organizations at both the national and local level to address the identified key gaps in implementing the National HIV and AIDS Strategic Plan in an effort to contain and reverse the epidemic.

participating-org.narrative: Ministry of Local Government and Chieftainship
